title: Trap Craft
description: Trap Craft is a defense game where there is a hacker who is ready to fulfill any desire of a Princess, Noob, Pro, Herobrine, and the rest if they want to play a game that the hacker prepared. The game is to protect the portal from the zombies' attack. Each character has its own ending, so find out all of them! Set traps and fight against the zombies, survive, and also get yourself a pet for your company.
